name: Simulator X-Ray Hand
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true X-rays of hand.
Simulator X-Ray Hand
Simulator X-ray hands - a game application joke, where you can make an X-ray hand without causing harm to themselves or to anyone! CAUTION This is not a real scanner, but only the emulator, the game The game is intended for entertainment and prank your friends and family!
You have nothing to do? Maybe you're wondering how many bones in your hand? Or want to make fun of other funny? Then you have found what you are looking! Download X-Ray Scanner hands, palms and finger and you will not regret!
To use it, hover over your head or a friend or loved ones, and then scan the result of surprise! The app does not any radiation and is completely safe for your health! The result is given random!
Attention! This is not a real X-ray, it is designed to joke and play!
Thanks for playing with us, leave us your comments and suggestions, we will try to make the game even more interesting for you!
